title.text: How much the middle class consume?
subtitle: BPS, author calculation

axis.labelExpr: if(datum.value == 'amc', 'Aspiring Middle Class', if(datum.value == 'mc', 'Middle Class', if(datum.value == 'uc', 'Upper Class', if(datum.value == 'poor', 'Poor', 'Vulnerable'))))
